nodes.text: Thissa Somori was a Pantoran female who led a village that was populated by members of the human, Pantorans and Talz. Somori's daughter, Arra, became a pirate captain, extorting the villagers for payment. The consulars Urma Athantras, Velai, and Tione Zrar assisted Somori in defending her village, coercing the pirates into negotiating with the inhabitants.
